column2: "Nice work, partner! Whew, we had some bumps in the road, but what's important is that we could come back safely."
"But we couldn't really find any vital clues... Well, if we keep going, we ought to find a new clue at some point."

"See ya, partner.
I hope we can work together again if something comes up!"

"相棒、お疲れ！
ふぅ、ハプニングもあったけど
無事に帰って来られて何よりだぜ。"

"肝心の手がかりは、いまいちだった
わけだけど……まあ、そっちは今後も
続けるし、いつかは展望も開けるだろ。"

"んじゃな、相棒。
またなんかあったらよろしくな！"
